lead_paragraph: India are resting batting mainstay Virat Kohli for the three 20-over matches against Sri Lanka this month with an eye on the Twenty20 World Cup on home soil.

headline.print_headline: India Rest In-Form Kohli for T20 Series v Sri Lanka
headline.main: India Rest In-Form Kohli for T20 Series v Sri Lanka

snippet: India are resting batting mainstay Virat Kohli for the three 20-over matches against Sri Lanka this month with an eye on the Twenty20 World Cup on home soil....
